Sentencas: This paper reports on the characterization of interfaces between oxide coatings and metallic interconnects that are used in planar solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: With the reduction of operating temperatures to 800 degrees C, it is possible to replace ceramic interconnects with less expensive stainless steels.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, when incorporating chromia-forming metallic interconnects, steps must be taken to inhibit chromium poisoning.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: One approach to prevent chromium poisoning, is to deposit dense, protective coatings, such as manganese cobalt spinel oxide (MCO).
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The brittle nature of MCO makes it susceptible to damage under mechanical and thermal stresses during operation.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A four point bend experiment is designed to assess the strength and adhesion of reduced and oxidized coatings deposited on SS441 or Crofer interconnects.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Resulting tensile cracking patterns on the convex side of bend specimen are used to quantify the interfacial shear strength with a shear lag model.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using energy based fracture mechanics, interfacial fracture energy is calculated from the strain at the onset of coating spallation.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Scanning electron microscopy images of the cracked coating surfaces are processed to analyze the failure mechanisms, crack spacing and spalled areas.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: At 3% strain, the weakest interface is found in the Crofer system with the oxidized coating.
Titulo: Mechanical characterization of oxide coating-interconnect interfaces for solid oxide fuel cells
